abstract_summ: Objects detection and removing consists of deleting unstable objects recognized by semantic segmentation method from images.In particular, our method consists of two modules, i.e., object decision module and object segmentation module.The object segmentation module aims to separate the target objects identified by object decision module.By combining both the digits and characters, obtained recognition accuracy is 95.39%.Pattern recognition and feature extraction of images always have been important subjects in improving the performance of image classification and Content-Based Image Retrieval (CBIR).The experiment carried out indicates superiority of the proposed method as a partition/segmentation algorithm - a process being usually a preprocessing stage of many object detection workflows.
title_summ: A Novel Object-Driven Indoor Point Cloud Partition MethodTraining Physical and Geometrical Mid-Points for Multi-person Pose Estimation and Human Detection Under Congestion and Low ResolutionImage-Based Place Recognition Using Semantic Segmentation and Inpainting to Remove Dynamic ObjectsExtraction and Recognition of Bangla Texts from Natural Scene Images Using CNNAn efficient image descriptor for image classification and CBIRMask-Guided Region Attention Network for Person Re-IdentificationJoint Multi-object Detection and Segmentation from an Untrimmed VideoNormal Grouping Density Separation (NGDS):
title_abstract_phrases: By combining both the digits and characters, obtained recognition accuracy is 95.39%.An efficient image descriptor for image classification and CBIRPattern recognition and feature extraction of images always have been important subjects in improving the performance of image classification and Content-Based Image Retrieval (CBIR).Objects detection and removing consists of deleting unstable objects recognized by semantic segmentation method from images.In particular, our method consists of two modules, i.e., object decision module and object segmentation module.The object segmentation module aims to separate the target objects identified by object decision module.Joint Multi-object Detection and Segmentation from an Untrimmed VideoIn this paper, we present a novel method for jointly detecting and segmenting multiple objects from an untrimmed video.
